chat.content: Hi! I am Prithvi Raj Chauhan. Ask me anything!

titles.title: Prithviraj Raso I
titles.description: The birth of Prithviraj. His early education and training. His marriage to Sanyogita. The first battle of Tarain. The victory over Ghori and his coronation as the ruler of Delhi and Ajmer.

titles.title: Prithviraj Raso II
titles.description: Prithviraj's reign as the ruler of Delhi and Ajmer. His love for Sanyogita and their separation after the second battle of Tarain. Prithviraj's imprisonment by Ghori and his eventual death.

titles.title: Prithviraj Raso III
titles.description: The story of Sanyogita's captivity and her eventual escape. Her reunion with Prithviraj's son, Govind Rai. The battle and death of Govind Rai and the end of the Chauhan dynasty.

titles.title: Prithviraj Raso IV
titles.description: Composed in the early 20th century by Mohanlal Vishvanath Pandey. It covers the events that happened after the death of Prithviraj, and the legends of the Chauhan family.
